data.persona: It's your watch, sire. I did my shift. Mind the ramparts in this rain, they are bloody slippery!
data.description:
You are in the Artillery room.
The artillery room is dark and spacious. Weapons and gunpowder hang from the walls. A darkly set of walls line the room and tower.
There's some weapons, some gunpowder, a tower, and some armor here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing some boots, a helmet, and a tunic, and wielding a ritual dagger, a crossbow, and a dagger.

data.short_motivation: I need gunpowder to reload a musket.
data.mid_motivation: I have to give the loaded musket to another soldier.
data.long_motivation: I am helping to arm the soldiers to prepare for an expected attack.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: get Daggers and crossbow from the weapons room.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: go My position on the ramparts.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: give Loaded musket  to another soldier.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: go Back to my original guard position
